医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
运动可预防患有骨关节炎的老年人患痴呆症最低限度运动 (MAE) 预防痴呆症的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Exercise-prevents-the-incidence-of-dementia-in-older-people-with-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Exercise-prevents-the-incidence-of-dementia-in-older-people-with-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6c97336-d5c5-4c11-b357-761cf4d3dd24 Thu, 05 Oct 2023 08:27:00 -0400 Exercise prevents the incidence of dementia in older people with osteoarthritis
研究表明，绿茶、抹茶和红茶：对抗 Omicron 亚变体的有效武器茶及其儿茶素在灭活 Omicron 亚变体方面的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Green-matcha-and-black-tea-Effective-weapons-against-Omicron-subvariants-research-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Green-matcha-and-black-tea-Effective-weapons-against-Omicron-subvariants-research-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a084d97d-8766-464f-9e2c-c17a47bd22a3 Thu, 05 Oct 2023 08:07:00 -0400 Green, matcha, and black tea: Effective weapons against Omicron subvariants, research reveals
完成人类基因目录的进展和挑战一组作者回顾了人类基因组注释的进展和挑战，包括蛋白质编码基因、亚型和非编码RNA，并倡导建立临床使用的通用注释标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Progress-and-challenges-in-completing-the- human-gene-catalogue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Progress-and-challenges-in-completing-the- human-gene-catalogue.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90716f58-85dc-4296-8630-25416094b0a0 Thu, 05 Oct 2023 07:56:00 -0400 Progress and challenges in completing the human gene catalogue
美联储限制使用预测软件，限制对 Medicare Advantage 患者的护理三月份，朱迪思·沙利文 (Judith Sullivan) 在康涅狄格州一家疗养院接受大手术后康复，当时她从 Medicare Advantage 计划中得到了令人惊讶的消息：该计划将不再支付她的护理费用，因为她的情况已经足够好，可以回家了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Feds-rein-in-use-of-predictive-software-that-limits-care-for-Medicare-Advantage-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Feds-rein-in-use-of-predictive-software-that-limits-care-for-Medicare-Advantage-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d39022c9-2b57-43c0-8fd8-076d18b53fa0 Thu, 05 Oct 2023 07:20:37 -0400 Feds rein in use of predictive software that limits care for Medicare Advantage patients
伪造或不合格的抗菌药物会增加抗菌药物耐药性吗？不合格或伪造 (SF) 抗生素与抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Can-falsified-or-substandard-antimicrobials-increase-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Can-falsified-or-substandard-antimicrobials-increase-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2bcb6f6-128b-4609-b5c9-d99d7ca8934e Thu, 05 Oct 2023 06:41:00 -0400 Can falsified or substandard antimicrobials increase antimicrobial resistance?
急性卒中的远程缺血调理远程缺血调理（RIC）对急性卒中患者功能结果的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Remote-ischemic-conditioning-for-acute-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Remote-ischemic-conditioning-for-acute-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1afd95a4-6c87-4e98-912d-924f98f97e2c Thu, 05 Oct 2023 06:10:00 -0400 Remote ischemic conditioning for acute stroke
发现多动症会增加老年驾驶者的撞车风险老年驾驶员注意力缺陷多动症与车祸风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/ADHD-found-to-increase-crash-risk-among-older-driven-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/ADHD-found-to-increase-crash-risk-among-older-driven-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=647dd739-d024-4496-86af-ff53a1fd8feb Thu, 05 Oct 2023 04:09:00 -0400 ADHD found to increase crash risk among older driving adults
新的斑马鱼异种移植平台可以帮助筛选胶质母细胞瘤治疗方法根据格哈特和德斯梅特实验室在《EMBO 分子医学》上发表的一项新研究，科学家们创建了一个新的斑马鱼异种移植平台，用于筛选一种名为胶质母细胞瘤的侵袭性脑肿瘤的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/New-zebrafish-xenograft-platform-could-help-screen-for-glioblastoma-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/New-zebrafish-xenograft-platform-could-help-screen-for-glioblastoma-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c47420b0-3e83-4ccc-9066-56499183d622 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 23:51:27 -0400 New zebrafish xenograft platform could help screen for glioblastoma treatments
研究表明癌症肿瘤劫持了神经发育的遗传程序癌症肿瘤“劫持”了正在发育的神经所使用的遗传程序。瑞典于默奥大学研究人员的一项研究表明了这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Cancer-tumors-hijack-genic-program-of-developing-nerves-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Cancer-tumors-hijack-genic-program-of-developing-nerves-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f22bfa9e-fa0b-4ff1-8fdf-ec783d3b373a Wed, 04 Oct 2023 23:15:39 -0400 Cancer tumors hijack genetic program of developing nerves, study shows
AI 模型结合成像和患者数据来改善胸部 X 光诊断根据北美放射学会杂志《放射学》上发表的一项研究，一种新的人工智能 (AI) 模型将成像信息与临床患者数据相结合，以提高胸部 X 光的诊断性能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/AI-model-combines-imaging-and-patent-data-to-improve-chest-X-ray-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/AI-model-combines-imaging-and-patent-data-to-improve-chest-X-ray-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89051757-74c4-4fed-ae8d-d93e2c428c0b Wed, 04 Oct 2023 23:08:21 -0400 AI model combines imaging and patient data to improve chest X-ray diagnosis
